alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 1:16PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT CENTRAL WAYNE...CENTRAL EMERY AND EASTERN CARBON COUNTIES... At 115 PM MDT...A snow squall was along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Sunnyside to 9 miles northwest of Hanksville...and moving east at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Green River, Hanksville, Sunnyside, East Carbon, Goblin Valley, Elgin and Woodside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 116 and 165. US Route 6 between mile markers 254 and 300. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 104 and 160. Utah Route 95 between mile markers 0 and 7. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. * sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this squall. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Canyonlands
